com.topcoder.shared.netCommon
Interface CSWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSHandler
public interface CSWriter

This interface is used for converting from Java primitive types, selected Java Collections types and CustomSerializable instances to a series of bytes and writing these bytes to a binary stream. Usually java.io.DataOutput is used for writing primitive types and the CustomSerializable.customWriteObject method is used for writing custom classes.

Author:
Timur Zambalayev
See Also:
CSReader, CustomSerializable, DataInput
